Class Klient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Klient

  • public class Klient
extends java.lang.Object
    accesses remote json data at abgeordnetenwatch.de for retrieving answer to a political category. Common categories have a common top level Group, defined in Themen. A question includes answer and category according to json profile of abgeordnetenwatch.de.
    Version:
    1.1, 13.10.2017
    Author:
    Rainer Wichmann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private boolean alternativeQuestion(java.util.ArrayList<singleprofile.Question> allAnsweredQuestions, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allAnsweredCategorys)
      looking for alternative questions relating to the chosen category It selectes the group of the category from combination and then checks, if there is a match between all categories in this group and the categories contained in allAnsweredCategorys the first match is used, no further search for matches are done prior to selecting the question, it is checked, if the answer or the summary in the answer is empty
      private boolean answerIsNotEmpty(singleprofile.Question localQ)
      check if answer or summary in answer are not empty
      private java.lang.String getAnswer()
      Klient.getAnswer() called to concatenate the answer String uses attribute question
      java.lang.String getText(java.lang.String questionUrl, Erststimme erst)
      Klient.getText() is called to return a question to the category from a profile, which is available via the String questionUrl.
      private java.lang.String noAnswerfromKlient()
      Klient.noAnswer() called if there is no answer from the profile candidateProfile, no other answer possible, therefore return dummy answer uses attribute firstname, lastname, category
      private boolean questionAnswered()
      check if it is possible to get an answer from the person, defined in the SingleProfile singleprofile, to a question from the category using attributes candidateProfile and category prior to selecting the question, it is checked, if the answer or the summary in the answer is empty sets attribute question, when there is an answer to the Question allAnsweredCategorys and all AnsweredQuestions are used to store the questions and its categories answered in the profile

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText(java.lang.String questionUrl,
                                Erststimme erst)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException,
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException
        Klient.getText() is called to return a question to the category from a profile, which is available via the String questionUrl. Attributes candidateProfile, firstname and lastname are set. Is asking to receive a SingleProfile from getDataUrl, uses a mapper or a client+webtarget+invocationbuilder+response. If no answer is availabe, it asks the Caller , a Erststimme erst, via erst.noAnswer() erst.alternativeAnswerfromSpeechelper() to return an alternative answer. If erst has no alternative answer, a simple dummy answer is returned.
        Parameters:
        questionUrl - String of the url where the questions of the candidate can be found.
        erst - may be used for asking the Erststimme erst, if no answer at all is available. Not implemented yet.
        Returns:
        String representing the answer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - during json mapping in mapper.readValue
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - during json mapping in mapper.readValue
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - during json mapping in mapper.readValue

      • questionAnswered

        private boolean questionAnswered()
        check if it is possible to get an answer from the person, defined in the SingleProfile singleprofile, to a question from the category using attributes candidateProfile and category prior to selecting the question, it is checked, if the answer or the summary in the answer is empty sets attribute question, when there is an answer to the Question allAnsweredCategorys and all AnsweredQuestions are used to store the questions and its categories answered in the profile
        Returns:
        boolean

      • alternativeQuestion

        private boolean alternativeQuestion(java.util.ArrayList<singleprofile.Question> allAnsweredQuestions,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> allAnsweredCategorys)
        looking for alternative questions relating to the chosen category It selectes the group of the category from combination and then checks, if there is a match between all categories in this group and the categories contained in allAnsweredCategorys the first match is used, no further search for matches are done prior to selecting the question, it is checked, if the answer or the summary in the answer is empty
        Parameters:
        allAnsweredQuestions - ArrayList of Questions
        allAnsweredCategorys - ArrayListof Questions
        Returns:
        boolean, true if Question and category found and locally set

      • answerIsNotEmpty

        private boolean answerIsNotEmpty(singleprofile.Question localQ)
        check if answer or summary in answer are not empty
        Parameters:
        localQ - Question, which includes answer
        Returns:
        boolean , true if answer or summary in answer are not empty

      • getAnswer

        private java.lang.String getAnswer()

        Returns:
        String representing the answer

      • noAnswerfromKlient

        private java.lang.String noAnswerfromKlient()
        Klient.noAnswer() called if there is no answer from the profile candidateProfile, no other answer possible, therefore return dummy answer uses attribute firstname, lastname, category
        Returns:
        String representing the Dummy a answer
